title: I dont want to level up can i turn it off?
body: Ok  this  lvl  system "to me" is pretty much useless, cause i already have all the champions and what is worse is making me anxius because i keep looking at my lvl getting higher and higher and feel like im wasting my time in ths game idk if it just me but it dosnt feel right the fact that it has no cap (not that iÂ´ve seen one) thers a way to turn it off? someone knows?

replies.body: We don't have any way of turning off XP gains right now, and I can really understand how it might annoy you leveling up and feeling like you aren't getting anything for it if you already own all the champions. Keep in mind those shards can be used for mastery as well, and the BE you're getting can be used in the future for specialty shops like the Blue Essence Emporium. It'd suck if we disabled all of your leveling and you weren't stockpiling this BE to use in the future!
